additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 28 attack speed and 8% movement speed.
For agility heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 28 attack speed, 8% movement speed and 16 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 28 attack speed and 8% movement speed.
Movement speed bonus from multiple Yasha-based items (Yasha, Yasha and Kaya, Sange and Yasha, Manta Style, Trident) do not stack.
Attack speed bonus from multiple Yasha-based items fully stack.
name: Yasha
description: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
trivia: Reference to a katana from the game Phantasy Star Online.
Yasha is a Japanese word for supernatural spirits; those akin to demons.
Riki's cosmetic item, Yasha the Quickblade, is based on Yasha.
